page.title: 01STUDY AREA _ DESCRIPTION
page.content: THE AREA INCLUDES A PART OF THE NORTHERN RESIDENTIAL AREA OF SOUTHAMPTON AND THE SOUTHERN PART OF CHANDLERS FORD AND EASTLEIGH HAMPSHIRE. MUCH OF THE AREA CONSISTS OF THE{RURAL-URBAN}FRINGE BETWEEN THESE SETTLEMENTS. IT IS AN AREA OF {GREEN BELT}WHICH CONSISTED OF GOOD FARMLAND AND MUCH MIXED WOODLAND. ON MUCH OF THIS LAND,{MOTORWAYS}HAVE AND WILL BE CONSTRUCTED AS WELL AS A {HYPERMARKET}AND SOME INDUSTRIES. NEW DEVELOPMENTS INCLUDE EXPENSIVE HOUSING ESTATES (Â£60 000+) RESULTING FROM THE CHOICE OF CHANDLERS FORD AS A GROWTH POINT FOR THE SOUTH HAMPSHIRE STRUCTURE PLAN. IT IS ALSO AN AREA OF PLANNED PRESTIGE OFFICE DEVELOPMENT AND HIGH TECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY. {GAZETTEER}:SUBURBS,MOTORWAYS,GREEN- BELT,HYPERMARKET,URBAN-RURAL FRINGE, HIGH TECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY,CHURCH.
